verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H4904>beds!<s%> when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is <S%H216>light,<s%> they <S%H6213>practice<s%> it, <S%H3588>because<s%> it <S%H3426>is<s%> in the <S%H410>power<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And they <S%H2530>covet<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and take them by <S%H1497>violence;<s%> and <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and take them <S%H5375>away:<s%> so they <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> even a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> do I <S%H2803>devise<s%> an <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4185>remove<s%> your <S%H6677>necks;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7317>haughtily:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall one take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H5091>lament<s%> with a <S%H5093>doleful<s%> <S%H5092>lamentation,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> We <S%H1961>be<s%> utterly <S%H7703>spoiled:<s%> <S%H7703><s%> he hath <S%H4171>changed<s%> the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> hath he <S%H4185>removed<s%> it from me! turning <S%H7728>away<s%> he hath <S%H2505>divided<s%> our <S%H7704>fields.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> that shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> a <S%H2256>cord<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Prophesy <S%H5197><s%> ye <S%H408>not,<s%> say they to them that <S%H5197>prophesy:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5197>prophesy<s%> to <S%H428>them,<s%> that they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5253>take<s%> <S%H3639>shame.<s%>

O thou that art <S%H559>named<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> is the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7114>straitened?<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> his <S%H4611>doings?<s%> do <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> do <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H5973>to<s%> him that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H3477>uprightly?<s%>

Even of <S%H865>late<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> is risen <S%H6965>up<s%> as an <S%H341>enemy:<s%> ye pull <S%H6584>off<s%> the <S%H145>robe<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> <S%H4136><s%> the <S%H8008>garment<s%> from them that pass <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H5674><s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> as men <S%H7725>averse<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>

The <S%H802>women<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> have ye cast <S%H1644>out<s%> from their <S%H8588>pleasant<s%> <S%H4480>houses;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H5768>children<s%> have ye taken <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1926>glory<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Arise <S%H6965><s%> ye, and <S%H1980>depart;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> your <S%H4496>rest:<s%> <S%H5668>because<s%> it is <S%H2930>polluted,<s%> it shall <S%H2254>destroy<s%> you, even with a <S%H4834>sore<s%> <S%H2256>destruction.<s%>

If <S%H3863><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> do <S%H3576>lie,<s%> saying, I will <S%H5197>prophesy<s%> unto thee of <S%H3196>wine<s%> and of strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%> he shall even <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H5197>prophet<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I will surely <S%H622>assemble,<s%> <S%H622><s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of thee; I will surely <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H6908><s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I will <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H3162>together<s%> as the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H1223>Bozrah,<s%> as the <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H1699>fold:<s%> they shall make great <S%H1949>noise<s%> by reason of the multitude of <S%H4480>men.<s%> <S%H120><s%>

The <S%H6555>breaker<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: they have broken <S%H6555>up,<s%> and have passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and are gone <S%H3318>out<s%> by it: and their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of them.
